entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 8:37 PM MDT Monday 3 April 2023
